generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: Modern buildings with glass facades and stone columns are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including sedans and a red car in front.
- bus: A black bus is visible in the distance, driving ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular warning sign and a pedestrian crossing sign.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- rider: A person is riding a motorcycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
